# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/zip-webpack-plugin`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for zip-webpack-plugin (https://github.com/erikdesjardins/zip-webpack-plugin).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/zip-webpack-plugin.
